ygData.subject: Re: Famous Last Words (was Weekend update...)
ygData.msgSnippet: My latest was: Cleric tells the group, I need to go soon, we can either leave now or get an easy pull... no more of those 1 hour CR pulls. Well, you can
ygData.messageBody:
My latest was:

Cleric tells the group, "I need to go soon, we can either leave now
or get an easy pull... no more of those 1 hour CR pulls."

Well, you can imagine what happened. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
50.8 Xegony


> Yeah, the other night it was "One last pull". Four of us died.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
>
> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> > speaking of famous last words, i think the best is "i'm going to
log soon"
> > or something to that effect. INSTANT death.
> >
> > Shada Powa, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
> > <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
> >
> > > "Follow me! (famous last words)" I tell my group
